thread.title: French Beach Tennis Champions come from Reunion Island
thread.title_full: French Beach Tennis Champions come from Reunion Island

author: eTN Editor
title: French Beach Tennis Champions come from Reunion Island
text:
French Beach Tennis Champions come from Reunion Island   
Sep 16, 2015 Image via reunion.fr eTN   
Good things come in fours for the Reunionnaise Hoarau sisters Marie-Eve and Mathilde when, at the seventh French Beach Tennis Championship they secured their fourth title after 2011, 2013, and 2014. 
Both sisters are honorary tourism ambassadors for the island's tourism marketing organization, Reunion Island Tourism (IRT), and were displaying the Reunion Island tourism logo on their shirts. 
The sisters have with their win also qualified to carry the French and Reunion regional flags to the European and World Championships after some hard-fought semi-finals and finals. 
Reunion Island, clearly a destination for and of champions! Source: Reunion Island Tourism (IRT)
